data.text: @jvocall @Billyb3332 What would you mean?

@solitary_org In this case, we suggest you contact net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com for further assistance. It may take a while for our officers to get back to you soon.

@SirRubalot We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@SirRubalot Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@elly_xiao Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible, Elly.
@sophieee2000 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@MohsinI76606220 Currently, it is canceled until 31 May 2020
@Jrwat_Jzmpg  ทีมงานแนะนำให้ท่าน ส่งอีเมลไปที่ net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com โดยแนบหมายเลขการจอง ชื่อสกุล วันและเวลาที่เดินทาง พร้อมความประสงค์ในอีเมลค่ะ
@mikepeacock1955 Please contact the information above about this issue.
@andy88099003 With pleasure 💜

@SheldonB14 Greetings, we really appreciate your comments on our service. Your compliment is valuable to us and this would help our staff to maintain standard service further. We wish it will get better soon too

@cilicher สวัสดีค่ะ ขณะนี้มีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมาก เจ้าหน้าที่จะใช้เวลาในการตอบกลับนานกว่าปกติ หากท่านต้องการความช่วยเหลือเร่งด่วนแนะนำให้ท่านติดต่อสำนักงานการบินไทยได้ทุกสาขา หรือสำนักงาน ณ ท่าอากาศยานเมืองต้นทางค่ะ ต้องขออภัยในความล่าช้ามา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ
@noonchu สวัสดีค่ะ สำหรับบัตรโดยสารที่ออกผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่าย ให้ท่านติดต่อผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่ายท่ท่านสำรองบัตรโดยสารโดยตรง ต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกด้วยนะคะ

data.text:
A new brighter day will always come. We just have to endure the night first.
Cr.[FB]แอ๊กช์ อันเดอร์สกอร์
#ThaiAirways #AirbusA350 #ThisTooShallPass #StayStrong https://t.co/QYLg6hemPq
@rajatdxit We would like to inform you that if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency.
@linzhan07401328 @SebFlorian @mighilcom Greetings, for transit passengers, please visit https://t.co/OZIUp9E852

@ClaireZhang85 We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@gwangjubb Greetings, we will notify you of the travel voucher soon. You may contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further information. However, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency.
@Bethnalboi64 Greetings, thank you so much for taking your time giving us your feedback about our services. We really appreciate your comments on our service. We wish you have a wonderful day!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

data.text: @ASarjam @fly365official We are sorry for the late response. As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.

@undersky11k เนื่องจากมีผู้ติดต่อจำนวนมาก ทำให้ไม่สามารถติดต่อได้และอาจทำให้เจ้าหน้าที่ตอบกลับอีเมลล่าช้า ทีมงานขอแนะนำให้ท่านติดต่อใหม่อีกครั้งหรือรอการตอบกลับอีเมลจากเจ้าหน้าที่นะคะ ทีมงานต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกมา ณ โอกาสนี้ค่ะ
@Healthy_Apple_ You may contact our THAI office via e-mail. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@Bevoknowsbest Greetings, may we inquire about our e-mail that you have sent to?

@Kezzabelle77 Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. If you booked through our website, please contact THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) press 911 for English or send email to contact@service.thaiairways.com

@Seb45239047 @shsshy We suggest that you contact our THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7D8yj. Our officers will check the terms and conditions of your ticket by the provided information and reply back to you as soon as possible.

@beidontlazyn สวัสดีค่ะ หากท่านสำรองที่นั่งผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่าย สามารถติดต่อตัวแทนจำหน่ายเพื่อเปลี่ยนแปลงการเดินทางค่ะ
หากท่านสำรองบัตรโดยกับการบินไทยโดยตรง และพำนักอยู่ที่ต่างประเทศ ท่านสามารถค้นหาสาขาของสำนักงานการบินไทยได้ผ่านลิงก์ https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR ค่ะ
@Galaxyyarena @YatraOfficial We suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR in order to give you further information.
@RamonSchopper Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@brigittajulia Hello, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@Nielsrinny Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@andy_stockwell We suggest that you send an email to net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or contact our office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further assistance.
@AnnaSarah_S As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@JordanAlicia8 We suggest that you contact them during business hours (9.00-17.00 Monday-Friday).

@AMarkdalen Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency to manage your ticket. If you booked through our website or our THAI office, please contact our THAI office for more information at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@dirtyspaniard Hello. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
